title: Neon Realms _ Sci-Fi Synthwave Music Pack (12 Tracks)
description: A dynamic sci-fi synthwave music pack featuring 12 tracks. Perfect for futuristic games, films, and trailers with Cyberpunk themes.
longDescription:
The Neon Realms – Sci-Fi Synthwave Music Pack delivers 12 high-quality, professionally mastered synthwave tracks designed to bring a futuristic edge to your game, film, or trailer. These tracks cover a range of Sci-Fi themes, from intense action sequences to atmospheric, ambient soundscapes. Whether you're exploring neon-lit cities or embarking on epic space journeys, this pack offers versatile compositions to enhance your project.

Track list:

  1. Neon City Nights – Pulsing synthwave with vibrant bass, perfect for futuristic urban scenes.
  2. Stellar Voyage – Atmospheric synth with dreamy melodies, ideal for space exploration.
  3. Cybernetic Pursuit – Fast-paced synthwave, great for chase or action sequences.
  4. Virtual Dreams – Hypnotic, glitchy synths for digital and virtual landscapes.
  5. AI Awakening – Dark synthwave, perfect for dystopian or sci-fi rebellion.
  6. Neon Horizon – Energetic synthwave, great for exploring futuristic cityscapes.
  7. Retro Future – Uplifting synthwave with nostalgic 80s vibes.
  8. Binary Skies – Calm, atmospheric synth for peaceful futuristic worlds.
  9. Cosmic Drift – Slow, ambient synthwave for space exploration.
  10. Digital Rebellion – Dark, glitchy synthwave perfect for cyberpunk action scenes.
  11. Galactic Waves – Uplifting, epic synthwave for space journeys.
  12. Neon Utopia – Bright, energetic synthwave for futuristic adventures.

All tracks are delivered in high-quality WAV format, ready for seamless integration into your Unreal Engine project.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 12

Number of Audio Cues: 12

Sample rate : 48.000
